thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Wholesale Nursery Business

title: Wholesale Nursery Business
text: Business Summary WHOLESALE NURSERY BUSINESS A leading wholesale perennial grower in Canada, this flourishing business has been supplying major clients for over 25 years, and has developed a major distribution network throughout Western Canada and the Pacific Northwest. Spread over 40 acres in a beautiful zoned ALR property, this business engages in the propagation and marketing of perennials, groundcover and aquatic plants; and is considered an innovator in the perennial industry by their peers. They grow over 1000 varieties of products, which are marketed in several sizes to their wide customer base. Included in this offering are greenhouses, inventory, trucks, equipment, buildings and a firmly established customer base of brand name retailers. Asking $2,688,000 The property is also being listed separately for $2,988,000 Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: EBITDA
